Hi! I'm an epidemiologist whose primary interests include quantifying environment-health interactions and the data \& methods used to do so.

I hold a master's degree from Columbia University's Departments of [Epidemiology](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/academics/departments/epidemiology) and [Biostatistics](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/academics/departments/biostatistics). My continued research activities at Columbia include work with both the Department of Epidemiology and Columbia's [IRI](https://iri.columbia.edu/), part of the [Earth Institute](https://www.earth.columbia.edu).

For more information, see my [current research](http://simmwill.github.io/cv), where you can find more in-depth descriptions of my  projects and my [CV](./files/cv.pdf). You can also see examples of my [prior work and projects](http://simmwill.github.io/examples).
